00012 DiagnosticsManager::DiagnosticsManager(const string& name, ros::NodeHandle& nh):
00013                                                 name_(name),
00014                                                 nodes_(),
00015                                                 nh_(nh),
00016                                                 max_skew_(1.0/250.0){
00017         //Printout startup information
00018         ROS_INFO_STREAM("Setting Up Oryx Diagnostics Manager <"<<name<<">...");
00019 
00020         //Register services/subscribers with ROS
00021         this->reg_srv_ = this->nh_.advertiseService("oryx/diagnostics/registration", &DiagnosticsManager::regCB, this);
00022         this->com_srv_ = this->nh_.advertiseService("oryx/diagnostics/commands", &DiagnosticsManager::comCB, this);
00023         this->hb_sub_  = this->nh_.subscribe("oryx/diagnostics/heartbeat", 10, &DiagnosticsManager::hbCB, this);
00024         this->soft_stop_pub_ = this->nh_.advertise<oryx_msgs::SoftwareStop>("oryx/software_stop", 2);
00025 
00026         //Register itself with its node manager
00027         this->nodes_.registerNode(name,"diagnostics_manager",0,-1,0);
00028         //Register commands
00029         this->registerCommands();
00030 
00031 }
00032 DiagnosticsManager::~DiagnosticsManager(){};

00034 void DiagnosticsManager::registerCommands(){
00035         //Register valid commands for communication with oryx_diagnostics_client
00036         this->commands_["node_list"]=boost::bind(&DiagnosticsManager::listCB, this, _1, _2);
00037 
00038         //Print out the supported command list
00039         ROS_INFO("Registered Commands...");
00040         BOOST_FOREACH(command_map::value_type item, this->commands_){
00041                 ROS_INFO("Registered Command: %s", item.first.c_str());
00042         }
00043 }

00045 void DiagnosticsManager::printList(){
00046         stringstream output;
00047         output<<"This is the Node List for Diagnostics Manager <"<<this->name_<<">\n"<<this->nodes_;
00048         ROS_INFO_STREAM(output.str());
00049 }

00051 void DiagnosticsManager::runDiagnostics(){
00052         while(ros::ok()){
00053                 NodeManager::result_map results;
00054                 //Get the current time to check against for heartbeat failure
00055                 ros::Time check_time(ros::Time::now());
00056                 //Get the list results of heartbeat check
00057                 this->nodes_.timeCheck(results ,check_time);
00058                 //For each item in the results map...
00059                 BOOST_FOREACH(NodeManager::result_map::value_type item, results){
00060                         bool failure  = false;
00061                         bool critical = false;
00062                         try{
00063                                 //If it failed...
00064                                 if(!item.second.first){
00065                                         //If it's critical, immediately send out the SoftwareStop message
00066                                         if(item.second.second==0){
00067                                                 oryx_msgs::SoftwareStop msg;
00068                                                 msg.message = "Critical Node Heartbeat Failure";
00069                                                 msg.stop        = true;
00070                                                 msg.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
00071                                                 msg.header.frame_id = "/robot";
00072                                                 this->soft_stop_pub_.publish(msg);
00073                                                 critical = true;
00074                                         }
00075                                         failure = true;
00076                                 }
00077                         }catch(std::exception& e){
00078                                 ROS_ERROR("Unexpected Error While Checking Heartbeats: %s", e.what());
00079                         }
00080                         //If there was a failure, print out some info
00081                         if(failure||critical){
00082                                 NodeManager::NodeInformationContainer info = this->nodes_.getNode(item.first);
00083                                 //If it was a critical failure, log to ROS_ERROR
00084                                 if(failure&&critical){
00085                                         ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Critical Node "<<info.getName()<<" Has Failed its Heartbeat Check, Soft-Stop Sent!!!!");
00086                                 }
00087                                 //Otherwise log to ROS_WARN
00088                                 else{
00089                                         ROS_WARN_STREAM("Non-Critical Node "<<info.getName()<<" Has Failed its Heartbeat Check!!!!");
00090                                 }
00091                         }
00092                 }
00093                 ros::spinOnce();
00094         }
00095 }

00103 bool DiagnosticsManager::regCB( oryx_diagnostics::DiagnosticsRegistration::Request& req,
00104                 oryx_diagnostics::DiagnosticsRegistration::Response& res){
00105         try{
00106                 res.node_id = this->nodes_.registerNode(req.node_name, req.node_type, req.criticality, req.heartbeat_frequency, req.heartbeat_tolerence);
00107                 res.success = true;
00108                 return true;
00109         }catch(oryx_diagnostics::NodeManagerException& e){
00110                 res.success = false;
00111                 return false;
00112         }catch(std::exception& e){
00113                 ROS_ERROR("%s", e.what());
00114         }
00115         return false;
00116 }
00117 
00121 void DiagnosticsManager::hbCB(const oryx_msgs::HeartbeatConstPtr& msg){
00122         ros::Duration skew((msg->timestamp-ros::Time::now()));
00123         if(skew>this->max_skew_){
00124                 ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Warning, received a heartbeat from <"<<msg->node_id<<"> With a skew of "<<skew<<", greater than max skew of "<<this->max_skew_);
00125         }
00126         try{
00127                 this->nodes_.touch(msg->node_id);
00128         }catch(NoMatchingNodeId& e){
00129                 ROS_ERROR("%s", e.what());
00130         }catch(std::exception& e){
00131                 ROS_ERROR("Unexpected Error: %s", e.what());
00132         }
00133 }

00142 bool DiagnosticsManager::comCB( oryx_diagnostics::DiagnosticsCommand::Request& req,
00143                 oryx_diagnostics::DiagnosticsCommand::Response& response){
00144         if(this->commands_.count(req.command)!=1){
00145                 response.success = false;
00146                 response.data = "Invalid Command:" + req.command;
00147                 return true;
00148         }else{
00149                 return this->commands_[req.command](req.data, response);
00150         }
00151         return false;
00152 }
00153 
00161 bool DiagnosticsManager::listCB(string& data, oryx_diagnostics::DiagnosticsCommand::Response& response){
00162         stringstream res_data;
00163         res_data<<"This is the current node list:\n";
00164         this->nodes_.printList(res_data);
00165         response.data = res_data.str();
00166         response.success = true;
00167         return true;
00168 }
